concept-wr.title: Preparing a Bootable USB Flash Drive
concept-wr.shortdesc: You can prepare a bootable USB flash drive from the boot image file included on the product DVD.

conbody.p: The product DVD includes an image file (.iso extension), which is used to create bootable media (for example, a bootable DVD or USB flash drive).

For convenience, instructions are provided for creating a bootable USB flash drive. If you prefer, you can prepare and use a bootable DVD or other bootable media, using any suitable open-source or commercially available software.
